param.mdate: SELECT value as mdate FROM rollupstats where name='mdate'
param.mtrans: select value as mtrans from rollupstats where name='mtrans'
param.contractName: select contract_name as contractName from saccount where account = $account
param.contractor_e: select contractor_e as contractor_e from saccount where account = $account
param.accountProfile: select concat(contractor_e,';',contractor_c,';',contract_name) as accountProfile from saccount where account = $account
param.weight365: select format(sum(xweight),0) as weight365 from (select idate,sum(weight) as xweight from craw where account = $account group by idate order by idate desc limit 365) T
param.totalWeight: select format(sum(weight),0) as totalWeight from craw where account = $account
param.totalTanker: select format(count(weight),0) as totalTanker from craw where account = $account and wst_type='bentonite'
param.statisticsLink: select concat('') as statisticsLink from dual
param.breakdownLink: select concat('') as breakdownLink from dual
param.tankerLink: select concat('') as tankerLink from dual
param.startDate: select date_format(min(idate),'%Y-%m-%d') as startDate from craw where account = $account
param.endDate: select date_format(max(idate),'%Y-%m-%d') as endDate from craw where account = $account
param.ievent: select concat('[',group_concat(xdate),']') as ievent from (select distinct date_format(idate,'%Y-%m-%d') as xdate from mraw where facility='$facility' and idate between '$year-$month-01' and last_day('$year-$month-01') order by idate) as T
